archimate:Product.name: Gremlin-JavaScript
archimate:Product.documentation: https://tinkerpop.apache.org/docs/current/reference/#gremlin-javascript Apache TinkerPopâ€™s Gremlin-JavaScript implements Gremlin within the JavaScript language. It targets Node.js runtime and can be used on different operating systems on any Node.js 6 or above. Since the JavaScript naming conventions are very similar to that of Java, it should be very easy to switch between Gremlin-Java and Gremlin-JavaScript.
